@graph.name: TREC Document-to-Document Relevance Assessment
@graph.description: This dataset is for the TREC Document to Document Relevance assessment along with its metadata and has a list, via hasPart of its outcomes.

@graph.name: TREC Document to Document Relevance Assessment: Software
@graph.description: This is the software source code facilitating the creation of a doc-2-doc relevance assessment on PMIDs used in the TREC 2005 Genomics track along with its metadata.
@graph.citation: Talha, M., Geist, L., Fellerhof, T., Ravinder, R., Giraldo, O., Rebholz-Schuhmann, D., & Castro, L. J. (2022). My Research Software (Version 1.0.0) [Computer software]. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7341391

@graph.name: TREC Document to Document Relevance Assessment: Software Release
@graph.description: This is the software release of the source code facilitating the creation of a doc-2-doc relevance assessment on PMIDs used in the TREC 2005 Genomics track along with its metadata.
@graph.citation: Talha, M., Geist, L., Fellerhof, T., Ravinder, R., Giraldo, O., Rebholz-Schuhmann, D., & Castro, L. J. (2022). TREC-doc-2-doc-relevance assessment interface (1.0.0). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7341391

@graph.name: Fleiss kappa for doc-2-doc relevance assessment: Dataset
@graph.description: This is dataset corresponds to the Fleiss Kappa for the document to document relevance assessment along with its metadata.
@graph.citation: Olga Giraldo, Dhwani Solanki, Dietrich Rebholz-Schuhmann, & Leyla Jael Castro. (2022). Fleiss kappa for doc-2-doc relevance assessment (1.0.0) [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7338056

@graph.name: Document-to-document relevant assessment for TREC Genomics Track 2005: Dataset
@graph.description: This dataset corresponds to the document to document relevance judgements on the TREC Genomics Dataset along with its metadata.
@graph.citation: Olga Giraldo, Dhwani Solanki, Fernanda Cadena, Andrea Robayo-Gama, Dietrich Rebholz-Schuhmann, & Leyla Jael Castro. (2022). Document-to-document relevant assessment for TREC Genomics Track 2005 (1.1.0) [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7324822

@graph.name: Document-to-document relevance assessment for TREC Genomics Track 2005
@graph.citation: Giraldo, O. L., Cadena, M. F., Robayo-Gama, A., Solanki, D., Fellerhoff, T., Geist, L., Ravinder, R., Talha, M., Rebholz-Schuhmann, D., & Castro, L. J. (2023). Document-to-document relevance assessment for TREC Genomics Track 2005. In Proceedings of the Semantic Web Applications and Tools for Healthcare and Life Sciences (SWAT4HCLS 2023) (pp. 98-101).
